title.narrative: Physical Security and Stockpile Management (PSSM) in Mauritania in Support of Improved National and Regional Security

description.narrative: The goal of this project is to contribute to contribute to improved security and stability in Mauritania and in the Sahel through the effective management of state-held weapons and ammunition. MAG will work to reduce the risk of diversion of weapons and ammunition through improved physical security at state-managed storage facilities and destruction of obsolete and unserviceable weapons and ammunition. MAG expects to conduct 15 technical assessments, complete 3 intervention plans, construct/refurbish 14 armories/weapons storage facilities, and conduct 5 armory compliance visits. MAG will also work to improve the capacity of national security forces to safely handle, manage, and store weapons and ammunition through the delivery of Armory Storekeeping and Management and Ammunition Storekeeping and Management training courses to a total of 55 personnel. Lastly, MAG will conduct 3 workshops in weapons marking strategy and 1 PSSM workshop to target middle management.
